name: pup parade
description:
hi :)! welcome to puppy parade!

to play, use arrow keys to move the puppy and befriend other doggies!

when they're following you, don't bump into them, or they'll get scared!

also don't fraternize with angry demon puppies, or your friends will get scared!

these puppies are very sensitive..

friend points

1 point2 points5 points10 points15 points20 points30 points50 points80 points

oh yeah! press

to activate paint mode!
